DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter randomize clinical trial compare oxytocin versus oxytocin foley catheter induction woman present premature rupture membrane labor .
DOC.brief_title: FOLCROM Trial : Foley Catheter Rupture Membranes
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , multi-center clinical trial test hypothesis woman term near term premature rupture membrane ( PROM ) , intrauterine Foley catheter plus oxytocin infusion decrease mean time induction delivery 2.5 hour compare oxytocin alone .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Spontaneous rupture membrane ( ROM ) ≥1 hour prior start induction ; ROM define clinical history presence 2 follow 4 : pooling , ferning , nitrazine , oligohydramnios . In absence clinical history , oligohydramnios AND pool must present ROM diagnose . Oligohydramnios define total amniotic fluid index < 5cm maximum vertical pocket < 2cm . 2 . Unfavorable cervix , define sterile digital exam ≤ 2cm dilate / 80 % efface 3 . Gestational age ≥ 34 week best obstetric estimate 4 . Clinical management decision vaginal delivery 5 . Singleton gestation 6 . Cephalic presentation 7 . Willing participate able understand sign inform consent document randomization 8 . Women reproductive age 1 . Multiple gestation 2 . Lethal fetal anomaly , e.g. , anencephaly , trisomy 13 , trisomy 18 3 . Latex allergy 4 . Greater 1 prior cesarean delivery 5 . Active labor define contraction frequent every 5 minute ( ≥ 12 contraction 1 hour ) associate ≥ 1 cm cervical change . In absence ≥ 1 cm cervical change 2 hour , patient contraction include study . 6 . Suspicion chorioamnionitis 7 . Any contraindication vaginal delivery , include malpresentation , active herpes , complete placenta previa , great two prior cesarean delivery , etc . 8 . HIV positive status AIDS 9 . Intrauterine fetal demise 10 . Suspected placental abruption , significant hemorrhage 11 . Nonreassuring fetal heart rate ( FHR ) pattern 12 . Participation compete trial
